models.categories: Four skill categories representing different dimensions of product work.

skills.title: Product Strategy & Roadmapping
skills.description: I prioritise using RICE, MoSCoW, and effort-vs-impact — so decisions stay rational, not intuition-driven.

skills.title: 0→1 Product Execution
skills.description: Built the IIT Jammu electricity analytics panel (B2B) from idea → workflows → shipped version used by campus stakeholders.

skills.title: Problem Framing & PRDs
skills.description: I anchor decisions on the user problem, constraints, and context — solutions only come after clarity.

skills.title: Execution Under Constraints
skills.description: I focus on fast loops and first value — shipping progress instead of chasing perfect scope.

skills.title: LLM-powered Workflows — TalentKnct
skills.description: Used AI inside real user workflows — improving relevance and reducing manual effort instead of adding "AI for the sake of AI."

skills.title: AI in My PM Workflow — Vibe Coding
skills.description: I work with AI across research, writing, and iteration — treating it as a thinking partner, not just a tool.

skills.title: Prompt & Behaviour Design
skills.description: I treat prompts like product levers — small changes reshape outcomes, flow, and user experience.

skills.title: Human-in-the-Loop Decisions
skills.description: I design AI to support judgment in decision workflows — not replace it blindly.

skills.title: Backend Systems · Python · Django
skills.description: Comfortable working close to systems — where reliability, clarity, and maintainability matter.

skills.title: Redis · Caching · Performance
skills.description: Improved real-world performance through caching patterns and access-path optimisation at scale.

skills.title: System Design & APIs
skills.description: Prefer simple, predictable architectures that scale without unnecessary complexity.

skills.title: Infra Awareness · AWS & Cost Sensitivity
skills.description: Treat infra choices as business choices — cost, stability, and user trust stay connected.

skills.title: User Surveys & Research — Airtribe
skills.description: Ran structured surveys and conversations to uncover real learner friction — turning signals into clear product direction.

skills.title: Creative Problem-Solving at Speed
skills.description: I explore options fast, test early, and converge on the solution that actually works in context.

skills.title: Strong, Direct Communication
skills.description: I share context, constraints, and decisions openly — helping teams move in one direction with confidence.

skills.title: Ownership & Action-Driven Mindset
skills.description: I take problems end-to-end — ship first value, refine with feedback, and scale with intention.
